name: Reckless Car Revolt - Highway Traffic Racer
name_original: Reckless Car Revolt - Highway Traffic Racer
description:
It's a Car driving game but with a lot more fun in it. The car is on a Revolt war and is insanely reckless.

This Car has super amazing powers and it don't smack the cars and objects in it's way but smashes them, destroys them and keep moving fast and far.

The Fun never ends here as there are tons of worlds, Facebook friends invite, sharing, Leaderboard.
